page.title: 02ASHDON SERVICES,FACILITIES.
page.content: our nearest junction to the M11 motorway is only 13 miles away.The A604 Colchester/Cambridge road is miles from the village centre. The land surrounding our village is gently undulating farmland with a few small woodlands and copses. The topsoil is mainly boulder clay, the remnants of the last ice age.Under this covering is London Clay and then chalk.We are , in fact,just on the Northern rim of the London basin. {Services} In Ashdon we have a general stores /post office,a butchers shop and a petrol filling station/garage which sells sweets,stationery and fancy goods.Adjoining this a small plant nursery is being developed.
